SANDWICHES & WRAPS

Chafing Racks and Sternos can be purchased for $10 per set

SANDWICHES & WRAPS


Sandwiches and wraps are available in fresh baked grinder bread, Italian bread, spinach wrap, tomato wrap, or garden wrap.

  • Chicken Chipotle

    Marinated roasted chicken breast, baby greens, chipotle aioli, red onion, parmesan cheese.

    6" Sub or Full Wrap: 7

  • Chicken Bacon Ranch

    Marinated roasted chicken breast, baby greens, applewood bacon, cheddar and ranch.

    6" Sub or Full Wrap: 7

  • Chicken Caesar

    Marinated roasted chicken breast, crisp romaine hearts, classic Caesar dressing, parmesan.

    6" Sub or Full Wrap: 7

  • Classic Italian

    Midwestern brown sugar ham, salami and pepperoni with mixed greens, vine ripe tomato, yellow onion, lemon herb dressing on fresh baked Italian grinder bread.

    6" Sub or Full Wrap: 6

  • Hummus Wrap

    Spinach wrap with homemade garlic hummus, vine ripe tomatoes, red onion, fetta cheese, and mixed greens topped with a lemon herb dressing

    6" Full Wrap: 7

  • Turkey Club

    Oven roasted turkey, applewood bacon, mixed greens, vine ripe tomatoes, roasted garlic aioli.

    6" Sub or Full Wrap: 6

  • Turkey & Ham

    Oven roasted turkey, brown sugar ham, mixed greens, provolone, lemon herb dressing.

    6" Sub or Full Wrap: 6

  • Turkey Avocado

    Oven roasted turkey, vine ripe tomatoes, red onion, fresh mozzarella, mixed greens, roasted garlic aioli.

    6" Sub or Full Wrap: 6

  • Veggie Wrap

    Baby greens, red onion, parmesan cheese, tomatoes, tossed in lemon herb vinaigrette dressing.

    6" Sub or Full Wrap: 7

PLATTERS

  • 4” Subs

    Variety of our fresh and hearty 4” subs in quantities of 12 or 20 per platter.

    Small Platter: 50
    Large Platter: 80

  • Half Wraps

    Variety of our healthy and delicious wraps in quantities of 12 or 20 per platter.

    Small Platter: 50
    Large Platter: 80

HOT SLIDER BAR


All ingredients come separately so you can build your own slider.

  • The Classic Burger

    All natural grass-fed beef patty. Available toppings to choose from include lettuce tomato, red onion, sliced pickles, and garlic aioli, and it is served on a fresh baked slider bun.

    60 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Double Trouble

    The Classic Burger, with double the beef, and double the pleasure.

    80 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Hot Chick

    Fresh all natural chicken perfectly spiced. Available toppings include lettuce, tomato, onions, chipotle slaw, and it is served on freshly baked slider bun.

    70 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • BBQ Slider

    Fresh pulled pork. Available toppings include sweet BBQ sauce, chipotle slaw, and it is served on a freshly baked slider bun.

    60 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • The Black Bean

    House-made black bean patty. Available toppings include red onion, lettuce, and chili mayo, and it is served on freshly baked slider bun.

    50 (Serves 8 - 10)
